name: Ext_R5_CarePlan_ac_pCP
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.CarePlan.activity.plannedActivityReference for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.activity.plannedActivityReference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Activity that is intended to be part of the care plan
element.definition: The details of the proposed activity represented in a specific resource.
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.plannedActivityReference` maps to R4B `CarePlan.activity.reference`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestOrchestration)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImmunizationRecommendation)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SupplyRequest)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Activity that is intended to be part of the care plan
